short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that guides users through onboarding to create a customized agent.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Set AI Agent is an intuitive tool designed to help you create customized, intelligent agents for various use cases, ranging from financial planning to customer support. Whether you're an entrepreneur, a student, or a busy professional, this extension allows you to quickly define and personalize your own AI-driven agent to meet your unique needs.

With this extension, you can:

Easily create and configure your personal agent by defining its persona, role, tone, and area of expertise.
Seamlessly integrate user-specific data into conversational contexts for effective communication with AI models.
Copy and share the synthesized prompt with one click, ready to be used in AI-based tools like GPT models.

Why Install It?

Personalized Conversations: Customize AI agents to fit your unique communication style and professional needs.
Easy to Use: The guided onboarding process makes it simple to set up an agent in just a few steps.
Highly Flexible: Suitable for a wide range of applications, from customer service to business automation and more.

Whether you're using AI for personal productivity or professional automation, this extension enhances your workflow by providing a simple interface for creating powerful agents on the go.
